name: professor-daniel-bukvich-composition-collection-data
title: Professor Daniel Bukvich Composition Collection Data
description: Metadata and data derived from Professor Daniel Bukvich Composition Collection. A collection of scores, sketches, parts, and auxiliary material produced by University of Idaho Lionel Hampton School of Music Composition Professor Daniel Bukvich.

contributors.title: Digital Initiatives, University of Idaho Library

resources.title: Professor Daniel Bukvich Composition Collection Metadata Facets
resources.description: Unique values and counts of metadata facet fields.
